languages.text: "Когда до нас дошли слухи о том, что вы пропали, мы терпеливо ждали новостей о вашем возвращении, но вскоре Даргонус сотрясла череда ужасных событий. Все началось с логистического подрыва, из-за которого сорвались поставки. На планете начались волнения, младшие дворянские семейства принялись грызться, пытаясь выставить конкурентов виновными... Мы приложили немалые усилия, чтобы утихомирить смутьянов. В конце концов нам удалось погасить восстания, к сожалению, не без помощи извне".

traits.locale_text: "Когда до нас дошли слухи о том, что вы пропали, мы терпеливо ждали новостей о вашем возвращении, но вскоре Даргонус сотрясла череда ужасных событий. Все началось с логистического подрыва, из-за которых сорвались поставки. На планете начались волнения, младшие дворянские семейства принялись грызться, пытаясь выставить конкурентов виновными... Мы приложили немалые усилия, чтобы утихомирить смутьянов. В конце концов нам удалось погасить восстания, к сожалению, не без помощи извне".
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "When we caught wind of the rumours of your disappearance, we patiently awaited news of your return, but then Dargonus was struck by a series of terrible events. The first was the sabotage of logistics that hampered shipments. Then mass unrest spread across the entire planet, and the minor noble houses began squabbling among themselves, trying to pin the blame on their rivals... We took great pains to calm them down and managed to quash the revolt, though not without some outside help, unfortunately."
languages.original_text: "Когда до нас дошли слухи о том, что вы пропали, мы терпеливо ждали новостей о вашем возвращении, но вскоре Даргонус сотрясла череда ужасных событий. Все началось с логистического подрыва, из-за которого сорвались поставки. На планете начались волнения, младшие дворянские семейства принялись грызться, пытаясь выставить конкурентов виновными... Мы приложили немалые усилия, чтобы утихомирить смутьянов. В конце концов нам удалось погасить восстания, к сожалению, не без помощи извне".

traits.locale_text: "When we have caught wind of the rumours of your disappearance, we patiently awaited the news of your return, but then Dargonus was shocked by a series of terrible events. The first was the sabotage of logistics that hampered the shipments. Then the mass unrest spread across the entire planet, the minor noble houses had started to fight among themselves, trying to pin the blame on their rivals... We took great pains to calm them down, and managed to suppress the revolt — though not without some outside help, sadly."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「陛下が失踪したという風の噂を聞き、ひたすら帰還の報をお待ちしておりましたが、ダルゴナスは立て続けに惨事に見舞われました。まず、物流の妨害工作により船の航行ができなくなりました。それから大規模な混乱は惑星全体に拡大し、下級貴族同士で争いが始まりました。ライバル家に責任をなすりつけ合おうとして…この騒動を収めるのに私たちは多大な苦労をし、どうにか暴動を鎮圧したのです。外部からの援助がなかったわけではありませんが、大変なものでした」
languages.original_text: "When we caught wind of the rumours of your disappearance, we patiently awaited news of your return, but then Dargonus was struck by a series of terrible events. The first was the sabotage of logistics that hampered shipments. Then mass unrest spread across the entire planet, and the minor noble houses began squabbling among themselves, trying to pin the blame on their rivals... We took great pains to calm them down and managed to quash the revolt, though not without some outside help, unfortunately."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下が失踪したという風の噂を聞き、ひたすら帰還の報をお待ちしておりましたが、ダルゴナスは立て続けに惨事に見舞われました。まず、物流の妨害工作により船の航行ができなくなりました。それから大規模な混乱は惑星全体に拡大し、下級貴族同士で争いが始まりました。ライバル家に責任をなすりつけ合おうとして…この騒動を収めるのに私たちは多大な苦労をし、どうにか暴動を鎮圧したのです。外部からの援助がなかったわけではありませんが、大変なものでした」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “最初听闻您失踪的传言时，我们都很耐心地等待您平安归来的消息，但达戈努斯随后遭受了一系列严重打击。先是物流系统遭到破坏，物资运输受阻。在那之后，大规模的动乱席卷整颗行星，小贵族开始自相残杀，互相攻讦，指责对方不义在先……我们费尽力气才劝止了这群贵族，平息了叛乱。遗憾的是，我们不得不借助外人的力量。”
languages.original_text: "When we caught wind of the rumours of your disappearance, we patiently awaited news of your return, but then Dargonus was struck by a series of terrible events. The first was the sabotage of logistics that hampered shipments. Then mass unrest spread across the entire planet, and the minor noble houses began squabbling among themselves, trying to pin the blame on their rivals... We took great pains to calm them down and managed to quash the revolt, though not without some outside help, unfortunately."

traits.locale_text: “最初听闻您失踪的传言时，我们都很耐心地等待您平安归来的消息，但达戈努斯随后遭受了一系列严重打击。先是物流系统遭到破坏，物资运输受阻。接下来，大规模的动乱席卷整颗行星，小贵族开始自相残杀，互相攻讦，指责对方不义在先……我们费尽力气才劝止了这群贵族，平息了叛乱。只可惜，我们不得不借助外人的力量。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Peu après votre disparition, et alors même que nous attendions impatiemment d'avoir de vos nouvelles, Dargonus a été le théâtre d'une série d'événements tragiques. Pour commencer, les convois de marchandises ont été fortement ralentis par un sabotage pur et simple de nos capacités logistiques. Ensuite, les maisons nobles mineures se sont mises à se quereller tout en essayant de rejeter la faute sur leurs rivales... Ces dissensions ont fini par mettre le feu à la planète tout entière, provoquant même une révolte que nous avons eu grand-peine à mater, et encore, uniquement grâce à une aide extérieure. »
languages.original_text: "When we caught wind of the rumours of your disappearance, we patiently awaited news of your return, but then Dargonus was struck by a series of terrible events. The first was the sabotage of logistics that hampered shipments. Then mass unrest spread across the entire planet, and the minor noble houses began squabbling among themselves, trying to pin the blame on their rivals... We took great pains to calm them down and managed to quash the revolt, though not without some outside help, unfortunately."

traits.locale_text: « Peu après votre disparition, et alors même que nous attendions impatiemment d'avoir de vos nouvelles, Dargonus a été le théâtre d'une série d'événements tragiques. Pour commencer, les convois de marchandises ont été fortement ralentis par un sabotage pur et simple de nos capacités logistiques. Ensuite, les maisons nobles mineures se sont mises à se quereller tout en essayant de rejeter la faute sur leurs rivales... Ces dissensions ont fini par mettre le feu à la planète tout entière, provoquant même une révolte que nous avons eu grand-peine à mater, et encore, uniquement grâce à une aide extérieure. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «Cuando nos enteramos de los rumores de su desaparición, esperamos pacientemente noticias de su regreso, pero entonces Dargonus se vio sacudido por una serie de terribles acontecimientos... El primero, fue el sabotaje de la logística que dificultó los envíos. Después, el malestar se extendió por todo el planeta y las casas nobles menores empezaron a pelearse entre ellas en un intento de echar la culpa a sus rivales... Nos esforzamos mucho por calmarlos y conseguimos aplacar la revuelta, aunque no sin ayuda exterior, por desgracia».
languages.original_text: "When we caught wind of the rumours of your disappearance, we patiently awaited news of your return, but then Dargonus was struck by a series of terrible events. The first was the sabotage of logistics that hampered shipments. Then mass unrest spread across the entire planet, and the minor noble houses began squabbling among themselves, trying to pin the blame on their rivals... We took great pains to calm them down and managed to quash the revolt, though not without some outside help, unfortunately."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando nos enteramos de los rumores de su desaparición, esperamos pacientemente noticias de su regreso, pero entonces Dargonus se vio sacudido por una serie de terribles acontecimientos... El primero, fue el sabotaje de la logística que dificultó los envíos. Después, el malestar se extendió por todo el planeta y las casas nobles menores empezaron a pelearse entre ellas en un intento de echar la culpa a sus rivales... Nos esforzamos mucho por calmarlos y conseguimos aplacar la revuelta, aunque no sin ayuda exterior».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Als wir das Gerücht von Eurem Verschwinden vernommen haben, haben wir geduldig auf Nachricht Eurer Rückkehr gehört, doch dann wurde Dargonus von einer Reihe schrecklicher Ereignisse heimgesucht. Zuerst wurde die Logistik sabotiert, was die Lieferungen behindert hat. Dann haben sich die Massenunruhen auf dem gesamten Planeten ausgebreitet, die niederen Adelshäuser haben begonnen, untereinander zu streiten, jeder wollte seinem Rivalen die Schuld in die Schuhe schieben ... Wir haben sie unter größten Mühen zur Räson gebracht und die Revolte beigelegt, allerdings leider nicht ohne Hilfe von außen."
languages.original_text: "When we caught wind of the rumours of your disappearance, we patiently awaited news of your return, but then Dargonus was struck by a series of terrible events. The first was the sabotage of logistics that hampered shipments. Then mass unrest spread across the entire planet, and the minor noble houses began squabbling among themselves, trying to pin the blame on their rivals... We took great pains to calm them down and managed to quash the revolt, though not without some outside help, unfortunately."

traits.locale_text: "Als wir das Gerücht von Eurem Verschwinden vernommen haben, haben wir geduldig auf Nachricht Eurer Rückkehr gehört, doch dann wurde Dargonus von einer Reihe schrecklicher Ereignisse heimgesucht. Zuerst wurde die Logistik sabotiert, was die Lieferungen behindert hat. Dann haben sich die Massenunruhen auf dem gesamten Planeten ausgebreitet, die niederen Adelshäuser haben begonnen, untereinander zu streiten, jeder wollte seinem Rivalen die Schuld in die Schuhe schieben ... Wir haben sie unter größten Mühen zur Räson gebracht und die Revolte beigelegt, allerdings leider nicht ohne Hilfe von außen."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Kaybolduğunuza dair söylentiler bize ulaştığında sabırla dönmenizi bekledik. Ancak bu süreçte Dargonus'u felaket ardına felaket vurdu. Başta lojistik hatların sabote edilmesiyle teslimatlar aksatıldı. Ardından gezegende karışıklıklar çıkmaya başladı, nispeten küçük soylu haneleri birbirlerini suçlamaya koyuldu... Bunları zorlukla sakinleştirip isyanı dindirmeyi başardık. Bunun için maalesef dışarıdan yardım almamız gerekti."
languages.original_text: "When we caught wind of the rumours of your disappearance, we patiently awaited news of your return, but then Dargonus was struck by a series of terrible events. The first was the sabotage of logistics that hampered shipments. Then mass unrest spread across the entire planet, and the minor noble houses began squabbling among themselves, trying to pin the blame on their rivals... We took great pains to calm them down and managed to quash the revolt, though not without some outside help, unfortunately."

traits.locale_text: "Kaybolduğunuza dair söylentiler bize ulaştığında sabırla dönmenizi bekledik. Ancak bu süreçte Dargonus'u felaket ardına felaket vurdu. Başta lojistik hatların sabote edilmesiyle teslimatlar aksatıldı. Ardından gezegende karışıklıklar çıkmaya başladı ve nispeten küçük soylu haneleri birbirlerini suçlamaya koyuldu... Bunları zorlukla sakinleştirip isyanı dindirmeyi başardık. Fakat maalesef dışarıdan yardım almamız gerekti."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
